output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number, but this doesn't automatically disqualify it as propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions and promotes CIUCĂ NICOLAE-IONEL, a presidential candidate, multiple times.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid Facebook advertisement reaching thousands of people (2000-2999 impressions).
4. Electoral objective: Clearly yes. The post: - Directly asks for votes ("votați la președinție candidatul") - Lists reasons to vote for Ciucă - Provides specific voting instructions for both election dates - Makes campaign promises and comparisons with other candidates
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: While starting as a personal statement, it transitions into clear campaign messaging and direct vote solicitation.
This post represents clear electoral propaganda as it meets all criteria under Article 36(7) and specifically promotes a presidential candidate after the campaign period has ended.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is definitely electoral propaganda because: - Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate - Directly solicits votes - Uses campaign messaging and promises - Is a paid advertisement reaching thousands - Makes comparisons with other candidates - Provides specific voting instructions
conclusion.message-for-police: Ilie Suciu și Partidul Național Liberal, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propagandă electorală pentru candidatul NICOLAE-IONEL CIUCĂ la funcția de președinte după încheierea perioadei de campanie. Postarea cu ID-ul 2321738621330179 pe Facebook conține îndemnuri directe la vot ("votați la președinție candidatul"), argumente electorale și instrucțiuni specifice de vot, fiind difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Mesajul a fost promovat ca reclamă plătită, atingând între 2000-2999 de persoane, constituind astfel un act deliberat de propagandă electorală în afara perioadei legale de campanie.
